_jira_project_comment: Your JIRA project key (e.g., 'PROJ', 'MYAPP', 'ENG'). Required for ticket creation.
_jira_affected_version_comment: Optional: Default affected version for bugs (e.g., 'v1.0', 'production')

sync._status_comment: TODO: Customize which JIRA statuses to sync when running 'daf sync'
sync._required_fields_comment: Optional: Fields required for ticket creation (e.g., ['sprint', 'story_points', 'acceptance_criteria'])
sync._assignee_comment: Filter tickets by assignee: 'currentUser()' (only your tickets) | specific username | null (all tickets)
